about_the_game:
Step into a radiant universe where thousands of unique creatures swarm, evolve, and create beauty across your screen. Through puzzles, sandbox experimentation, and creature creation, you'll discover an entire cosmos of unexpected interactions and breathtaking wonders.

Draw paths to guide the flocking spirits to their home planets. Each glowing swarm is a unique being with its own personality. Some will faithfully follow the paths you draw, serving as shepherds for their more capricious companions. Others dance to the cosmic winds in their own way - drawn irresistibly to their companions, floating away from others, or transforming into new forms when crossing paths.

Three Ways to Play

Embark on a Puzzle Adventure

Guide glowing swarm creatures to their home planets across 60+ handcrafted puzzles. Draw pathways for shepherd species, harness natural attractions and repulsions, and discover how different beings transform when they meet. Through careful observation and experimentation, you'll understand each species' unique nature.

Shape a Living Universe

Create your own living ecosystems in an open simulation space. Spawn different species and watch as they form complex, emergent patterns. Some creatures might shepherd others along paths you draw, while different species may attract, avoid, or even consume one another. Every interaction can lead to fascinating chain reactions and the emergence of entirely new forms of life.

Design Life Itself

Become a cosmic architect by designing your own creatures. Fine-tune over 20 behavioral parameters including speed, energy consumption, curiosity, and social tendencies. Watch how your creations interact with existing species - they might form symbiotic relationships, compete for resources, share with others, or combine their genomes to spawn entirely new beings.

Technical Innovation

FROST’s advanced GPU acceleration powers thousands of independent entities, each responding in real time to your actions and their surroundings. This cutting-edge technology creates a dynamic, living universe where every movement, transformation, and interaction feels organic and alive.

A Peaceful Experience

There are no timers or penalties—just pure exploration and discovery. Whether you're solving puzzles or experimenting in the sandbox, you'll be accompanied by a soothing soundtrack that dynamically follows your every move.

Join the Journey

Wishlist FROST now and prepare to immerse yourself in this hypnotizing symphony of light, motion, and life. Don’t miss your chance to experience the wonder.

FEATURES:

  • 60+ Handcrafted Puzzle Levels: Solve intricate puzzles by guiding glowing creatures to their home planets using pathways, transformations, and natural interactions.

  • Sandbox Mode: Build and experiment with living ecosystems in an open, dynamic simulation.

  • Creature Configurator: Customize creatures with over 20 behavioral parameters, from speed to social tendencies, to craft unique species.

  • Technical Innovation: Watch thousands of independent entities interact in real time, powered by advanced GPU acceleration.

  • Emergent Ecosystems: Observe creatures forming relationships, creating self-sustaining systems, or triggering chain reactions.

  • Relaxing Gameplay: No timers, no penalties—just exploration, experimentation, and a soothing soundtrack that evolves with your actions.

  • Endless Discovery: Create new species, uncover emergent behaviors, and witness how life evolves naturally in this living universe.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in a radiant, ever-changing cosmos filled with glowing creatures and mesmerizing patterns.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit, build 1903+ (10.0.18362)
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit, build 1903+ (10.0.18362)
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
